titleInfo.title: Pyrogallol[4]arenes as artificial receptors for L-carnitine

mods.abstract: Complexation thermodynamics of pyrogallol[4]arenes with L-carnitine and other biologically important ammonium ions were investigated by isothermal titration calorimetry. (C) 2009 Published by Elsevier Ltd.

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Schnatwinkel, B., Rekharsky, M.V., Borovkov, V.V., Inoue, Y. & Mattay, J. (2009). Pyrogallol[4]arenes as artificial receptors for L-carnitine. TETRAHEDRON LETTERS, 50(13), 1374-1376. Elsevier BV. doi:10.1016/j.tetlet.2008.10.108.
